root: ^My name's Blocky, and I'm here to introduce you to the game!
^You're currently in the tutorial level, have a look around and get a feel for your controls.
^You can probably already guess that you can move around with the WASD keys, you can also rotate the camera by holding right click and dragging around.

^Now, next to me is a strange green looking slate, this is where you should start as it teaches you a bitesize lesson of a topic. Learn well from it as you will need the knowledge to solve the red slates around.
^Completing red slates in the world will unlock new things in the environment, or the door to the next level!
